title: Balance 1950
brief_description: Animated drawings showing the balance sheet of Imperial Chemical Industries for 1950. Vivacious little “match stick” men, aided by ever active “Pound” and other devices perform against a backdrop of graphs and ledgers. An interesting example of simplified animation technique in which an unpopular subject is treated in an entertaining way.
